snippet: NYSE Euronext, which was prevented by European regulators last week from merging with Deutsche Börse, reported 19 percent decline in fourth-quarter profit.
abstract: NYSE Euronext, which was prevented by European regulators from merging with Deutsche Borse, reports 19 percent decline in fourth-quarter profit; net income was $110 million, or 43 cents a share, compared with $135 million, or 51 cents a share, in year-ago quarter.
lead_paragraph: NYSE Euronext, which was prevented by European regulators last week from merging with Deutsche Börse, reported 19 percent decline in fourth-quarter profit.

headline.main: Failed Takeover Hurts Results at NYSE Euronext
headline.print_headline: Failed Takeover Hurts Results at NYSE Euronext
